data.name: ItemAddEmailAccount
data.value: Add your email account to ${LetterLogoText} Mail and manage all correspondence in one place

data.name: ItemAddFilesCreatWorkspace
data.value: Connect cloud storages you use to ONLYOFFICE to create a single workspace for all your docs.

data.name: ItemAddTeamlabMail
data.value: Add your email account and manage all correspondence in one place

data.name: ItemAdjustRegionalSettings
data.value: Tip #2: Adjust the regional settings

data.name: ItemAdjustRegionalSettingsText
data.value: Choose the language for your web-office interface and set the correct time zone. It's particularly important for the notifications and the correct calendar work. Go to Settings >> Common >> Customization.

data.name: ItemARM
data.value: ARM

data.name: ItemARMText
data.value: Set up individual access rights for each contact - person or company.

data.name: ItemBrandYourWebOffice
data.value: Tip #1: Brand your web-office

data.name: ItemBrandYourWebOfficeText
data.value: Change the portal logo settings following Settings >> Common >> White Label and uploading your company's logos of the specified sizes. To change the default portal title displayed on the Welcome page, go to Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Welcome Page Settings.

data.name: ItemCreateWorkspaceDocs
data.value: Create a single workspace for all your docs

data.name: ItemCustomization
data.value: Customization

data.name: ItemCustomizationText
data.value: Set up CRM system according to your company needs. Customize user fields, set opportunity stages and task categories, create the company profile to include this information into invoices, etc.

data.name: ItemCustomizeWebOfficeInterface
data.value: Tip #3: Customize your web-office interface

data.name: ItemCustomizeWebOfficeInterfaceText
data.value: Name the portal groups, its members and their activities following Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Team Template. Select the color theme that best suits your company brand.

data.name: ItemFeatureCommunity
data.value: Community

data.name: ItemFeatureCommunityText
data.value: Create an internal social network with blogs, forums, polls, etc. to organize an efficient two-way communication. Moreover it allows you to discover hidden talents, creative persons, able to organize and lead.

data.name: ItemFeatureDocCoAuthoring
data.value: Document Co-authoring

data.name: ItemFeatureDocCoAuthoringText
data.value: Share docs with your team and edit them together in real time. Add comments and interact with your co-authors using the integrated chat.

data.name: ItemFeatureEmailSignature
data.value: Email Signature

data.name: ItemFeatureEmailSignatureText
data.value: Create an effective email signature using text, picture, link or even generated HTML code.

data.name: ItemFeatureFolderForAtts
data.value: Folder for Attachments

data.name: ItemFeatureFolderForAttsText
data.value: Set up a folder to automatically save all the future attachments into it.

data.name: ItemFeatureGanttChart
data.value: Gantt Chart

data.name: ItemFeatureGanttChartText
data.value: Define processes, priorities and dependencies to help your team to better perform tasks. Monitor progress and perform changes in time using a visualized picture of your project.

data.name: ItemFeatureLinksVSAttachments
data.value: Links Instead of Attachments

data.name: ItemFeatureLinksVSAttachmentsText
data.value: Insert a link to a file instead of attaching it and manage access rights to it to reduce the mail traffic and send a large file.

data.name: ItemFeatureMailboxAliases
data.value: Mailbox Aliases

data.name: ItemFeatureMailboxAliasesText
data.value: Use the aliases if you need to change your email address without creating a new mailbox.

data.name: ItemFeatureMailGroups
data.value: Mail Groups

data.name: ItemFeatureMailGroupsText
data.value: Creating a mail group is a great way to make certain emails available for a group of users. No need to duplicate messages, which incredibly reduces the mail storage space.

data.name: ItemFeatureProjectDiscussions
data.value: Project Discussions

data.name: ItemFeatureProjectDiscussionsText
data.value: Discuss issues - any sort of problems and outstanding questions that occur - with your team to find a better solution together.

data.name: ItemFeatureTalk
data.value: Talk

data.name: ItemFeatureTalkText
data.value: Use chat rooms to create a conference in real time, mailing lists to send a message to many people at once, notifications to follow news.

data.name: ItemImportProjects
data.value: Import projects

data.name: ItemImportProjectsBasecamp
data.value: Import projects from Basecamp

data.name: ItemIntegrateDocs
data.value: Integrate documents

data.name: ItemIntegrateIM
data.value: Integrate your IM client with ONLYOFFICE talk and stay tuned

data.name: ItemLinkWithProjects
data.value: Link with projects

data.name: ItemLinkWithProjectsText
data.value: Working on an opportunity might require the involvement of the whole team of the specialists. Create a project and link it with the opportunity to coordinate the work more efficiently.

data.name: ItemMailIntegration
data.value: Mail Integration

data.name: ItemMailIntegrationText
data.value: Keep all the information about contacts, opportunities and cases in one place including email correspondence. Link a conversation or a single message with a necessary CRM element.

data.name: ItemModulesAndTools
data.value: Tip #4: Select necessary modules and tools

data.name: ItemModulesAndToolsText
data.value: From now on you get access to a complete set of tools for office collaboration. Enable those you need for your work following Settings >> Common >> Modules & Tools. The disabled ones will be hidden

data.name: ItemSecureAccess
data.value: Tip #5: Secure the access to your web-office

data.name: ItemSecureAccessText
data.value: ${LetterLogoText} portals are hosted on Amazon Web Services, one of the most protected cloud computing platforms today, but you can always add an extra security layer. Set the password strength and enable 2-factor authentication to protect your data. To do so, go to Settings >> Security >> Portal Access

data.name: ItemTryOnlineDocEditor
data.value: Try full-featured online document editing in your browser

data.name: ItemUploadCrm
data.value: Upload CRM contacts

data.name: ItemUploadCrmContacts
data.value: Upload CRM contacts to ONLYOFFICE to access them everywhere

data.name: ItemUploadCrmContactsCsv
data.value: Upload CRM contacts from a csv. file

data.name: ItemWebToLead
data.value: Web-to-Lead

data.name: ItemWebToLeadText
data.value: Create and embed the contact form into your company website. Gather new lead information automatically and gain more prospective customers effortlessly.

data.name: LinkLearnMore
data.value: Learn More >>

data.name: pattern_activate_email
data.value:
h1.Activate your email for "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal.
Hello $UserDisplayName,
To start participating in the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal life you need to activate your email address. This is done for security reasons.
$GreenButton
This link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email activation within that period.

data.name: pattern_admin_voip_blocked
data.value: h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" VoIP disabled

data.name: pattern_admin_voip_warning
data.value:
h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
VoIP Balance: $Body

data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal backup created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal has been created.
To learn more on the backup procedure please refer to our "Data backup":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/data-backup-restore.aspx" user guide.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support.onlyoffice.com":"http://support.onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_change_email
data.value:
h1.Email address change request
You have requested to change your email address used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your email address:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email change process within that period.
You might need your old email address to access the portal when you follow the link. If you do not remember the old email address, please contact your portal administrator.
If you do not want to change your email or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_change_password
data.value:
h1.Password change request for the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
There has been a request to change your password used to enter the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
Please follow the link below to change your password:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the password change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your password or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_change_phone
data.value:
h1.Mobile phone change request
You have requested to change your mobile phone used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your mobile phone:
$GreenButton
If you do not want to change your mobile phone or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_change_tfa
data.value:
h1.Backup codes change request
You have requested to change your backup codes used to enter the ${LetterLogoText} portal.
Please follow the link below to change your backup codes:
$GreenButton

data.name: pattern_confirm_owner_change
data.value:
h1.Change of "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner to $UserName.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal owner change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_dns_change
data.value:
h1.Change of portal address
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal address to "$PortalAddress":"$PortalAddress" #if($PortalDns != "") ("$PortalDns":"$PortalDns" )#end.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal address change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_for_admin_notify
data.value:
h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Email: $UserEmail
$Body

data.name: pattern_invite
data.value:
h1.Invitation to join ${LetterLogoText} portal
Dear $UserDisplayName,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join ${LetterLogoText} - your team's portal that would enchance internal cooperation. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" (adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are most likely to get to use it a lot).
You can accept the invitation by following the link below, it is only valid for 7 days:
$GreenButton

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal
Hello,
You have requested to join the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal at ${LetterLogoText} - a platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues or friends right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_created
data.value: Dear $UserName, Administrator has created a new $Address mailbox for you at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Use the following settings for other email clients: Login: $Login Password: "set password":"$MyStaffLink" Incoming Mail (IMAP): Server: $Server Port: $ImapPort SSL/TLS: $Encryption Outgoing Mail (SMTP): Server: $Server Port: $SmtpPort SSL/TLS: $Encryption Requires Authentication: Yes If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_without_settings_created
data.value: Dear $UserName, Administrator has created a new $Address mailbox for you at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_mailbox_password_changed
data.value: Dear $UserName, The password for the $Address mailbox has been changed. If you received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_migration_error
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration error
An error has occurred while migrating to the $RegionName region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_migration_server_failure
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration error
An error has occurred while migrating to another region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_migration_start
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration started
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is started. It might take some time depending on your data amount.
*Note*: the portal will not be available during the migration process. After the migration is complete the portal URL will be changed and all the shared documents links will be inaccessible.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.^

data.name: pattern_migration_success
data.value:
h1.Another region portal migration successfully completed
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is successfully completed. Your portal is now available at "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl" portal.^

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Deactivation of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: p=. "Reactivate Portal":"$ActivateUrl" (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Deletion of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
*Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.*
#if($AutoRenew == "True") Before you delete the portal, please make sure that automatic billing is turned off. You may check the status of automatic billing in your "Avangate account":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/". #end
If you still want to delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal please follow the link below to confirm the operation:
$GreenButton
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_portal_delete_success
data.value:
Dear $OwnerName,
Your portal "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" has been successfully deleted but we would highly appreciate your feedback. Please share your experience of using ${LetterLogoText} and give us a hint on how could we make it better. Your opinion is very impotant for us!
Please, fill this form to leave your feedback:
$GreenButton
It will take you just a minute.
Thank you and good luck!
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_portal_delete_success_freecloud
data.value:
Dear $OwnerName,
Thank you for giving ${LetterLogoText} Free Cloud a try. Your portal "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" has been successfully deactivated and we would highly appreciate your feedback. Please share your experience of using ${LetterLogoText} Office and give us a hint on how could we make it better. Your opinion is very important for us!
Please, fill this form to leave your feedback:
$GreenButton
It will take you just a minute.
Thank you and good luck! ONLYOFFICE Team.

data.name: pattern_portal_rename
data.value:
h1.Change of portal address
Dear $UserDisplayName,
Your $PortalUrl portal address was changed to the new "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" address.
*Note*: All the shared documents links are inaccessible now, as well as DNS settings and single sign-on options stop working until you change them. The third party iCal links added to your calendar will also stop updating until you reload them.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_profile_delete

If you do not want to receive the notifications about the new events on the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_activation
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
You have just created the ONLYOFFICE portal, your team's portal that would enhance internal cooperation. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" (adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are most likely to get to use it a lot). Follow the link below to confirm your email address:

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_welcome
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
ONLYOFFICE provides you with security tools that allows you to:
- Turn on HTTPS to keep your portal data secure;
- Backup your portal data on a regular basis to avoid any data-loss;
- Track login history and receive the audit trail data;
- Enable two-factor authentication.
To turn on two-factor authentication, connect one of the service providers in Settings >> Integration >>Third Party Authorization, and then go to Settings >> Security >> Two-factor authentication to enable the feature
The rest of the tools are available in Control Panel, where you can also change the default portal logos, import users from your LDAP server and check for available ONLYOFFICE updates.
$GreenButton
For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

Note: we do not send out confidential information (like your password) in emails for safety reasons. You may change your email or password in your "personal profile page":"$MyStaffLink".
Language and time zone can be altered in "general settings":"$SettingsLink". After the portal customization you may start inviting your team members to the portal. Enjoy the flight!

data.name: pattern_enterprise_user_welcome
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Get started with it today!
h3.Start working with Documents:
# Create and edit text documents, spreadsheet and presentations. # Connect cloud storages you use to create a single workspace for all of your docs. # Share documents with your team members. # Explore different ways of working on docs together: two real-time co-editing modes, review, comments, chat.
h3.Try additional ONLYOFFICE tools:
# Add your email account to "ONLYOFFICE Mail":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/mail/". # Create "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and manage your workflow by adding milestones and tasks. # Manage your customer relations using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/". # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, share bookmarks. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with your teammates online.
$GreenButton
Do you know that you're using the most powerful online editors in the world? Want to know why ONLYOFFICE is better than MS Office Online, Google Docs or Collabora? "Look here":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/document-editor-comparison.aspx"
An additional tip: use free ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors to work on documents, spreadsheets and presentations offline. Connect the application to your portal to get access to documents stored there. "Download now":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/desktop.aspx"
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

$GreenButton
We will also send you useful tips, latest ONLYOFFICE news and special offers once in a while. You can cancel the subscriptions on your Profile page at any moment as well as re-enable them.
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" or visit our "Forum":"http://cloud.onlyoffice.org".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_saas_guest_welcome
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Your guest profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
h3.Get started with your portal:
# Edit your "profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # View and comment the content open available for all portal users in the "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/", "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" modules. # Add and download files available for you in the "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/" module. # Organize your schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with other portal users online.
$GreenButton
One more tip: edit documents offline using "ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/desktop.aspx" or work on them on-the-go with ONYOFFICE Documents app for "iOS":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/onlyoffice-documents/id944896972" or "Android":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onlyoffice.documents". It is free!
We will also send you useful tips, latest ONLYOFFICE news and special offers once in a while. You can cancel the subscriptions on your Profile page at any moment as well as re-enable them.
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}" or visit our "Forum":"http://cloud.onlyoffice.org".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_hosted_admin_invite_teammates
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
The cloud office for your team is already created at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates to join it. The easiest way to do that is to distribute the invitation link using the *Invite users to portal* option.
$GreenButton
If you have access to the detailed contact information of the people, add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module. "Learn more >>":"${__HelpLink}/gettingstarted/people.aspx#AddingUsers_block"
Or add users all at once from: "your Yahoo or Google account":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx", "your mail client address book":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx", "a CSV file":"${__HelpLink}/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx".
Once added, manage their access rights. For more information about ARM, visit our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_customize_portal
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
It’s likely that ONLYOFFICE is a new experience for you so we figured that you might like some tips and tricks to get you started. $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton

For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Note that all members of your team can use ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors to work on documents offline. The application is free and can be connected to your ONLYOFFICE portal. "Download now":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/desktop.aspx"
Let your team also use ONLYOFFICE Documents app to manage and edit docs on iOS devices Get it on "App Store":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/onlyoffice-documents/id944896972"
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_without_activity
data.value:
Hello $UserName,
My name is Katarina and I work for ONLYOFFICE. I started my work here long time ago, at the very beginning of the project. Believe me, I know everything about this application!
How is it going there? Is everything clear? Please share with me your impression. The feedback is the best contribution!
If you have questions regarding how to use ONLYOFFICE or need help to start using it, just let me know. You can also send me feedback or ideas to help improve ONLYOFFICE.
Be productive and access your office at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" from anywhere!
Mail me at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com" whenever you need help.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_user_docs_tips
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
In almost every business we are to deal with documents every day - contracts, reports, white papers, invoices, etc. - and waste a lot of time moving it around. To help you work more efficiently and reduce time and efforts spent on paperwork, make use of these 7 simple tips and tricks.
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItem6 $TableItem7 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton
Do you know that you're using the most powerful online editors in the world? Want to know why ONLYOFFICE is better than MS Office Online, Google Docs or Collabora? "Look here":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/document-editor-comparison.aspx"
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: subject_enterprise_admin_user_docs_tips
data.value: 7 Tips and Tricks to Work More Effectively in ONLYOFFICE Documents

data.name: ButtonDownloadNow
data.value: Download now

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips1
data.value: Tip #1. Use the Real-time co-editing feature to speed up the interaction process when specifying details or proofreading a document. Choose between two co-editing modes - Fast when you see changes as your co-author is typing or Strict when the changes are shown only after saving the document.

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips2
data.value: Tip #2. Use the Version History option to check the changes made to a file by you and your teammates or see who made the specific edits.

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips3
data.value: Tip #3. Use the Review feature to avoid manual tracking changes and merging. Grant a quick access to your document for reviewing and let others suggest changes without actually editing the document. Easily accept or reject suggested changes.

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips4
data.value: Tip #4. Share documents with other users or people. Attach documents as links to your email to reduce the mail traffic.

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips5
data.value: Tip #5. Use the Mail Merge function to create a set of personalized messages or a templates and save time you usually spend on writing the same text several times.

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips6
data.value: Tip #6. Download free ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors to work on documents without Internet connection. Note that the app can be connected to your ONLYOFFICE portal to access documents stored there.

data.name: ItemEnterpriseDocsTips7
data.value: Tip #7. Download ONLYOFFICE Documents app and install it on your iOS device to work with documents anywhere, anytime, even on the go.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_payment_warning_before7
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Please note that your ONLYOFFICE subscription is about to expire in a week.
In order to extend your subscription, you need to purchase a product renewal for ONLYOFFICE.
Click on the link below to start the renewal process: "Pricing page":"$PricingPage"
For your convenience, when you purchase your next renewal, you can also enable the "auto-renew" license option, in which case your license will be renewed automatically at expiration time.
A separate email with payment details for the recurrent billing will be sent on the expiration date.
You will be able to disable the "auto-renew" option at any time by accessing myAccount (My Products section) at: "https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx"
For any further ONLYOFFICE installation, activation and technical support issues, please contact our support team at "http://support.onlyoffice.com/":"http://support.onlyoffice.com/"
For payment related issues please contact Avangate by email at "support@avangate.com":"mailto:support@avangate.com"
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_trial_warning
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Thank you for having given ONLYOFFICE a try. Your trial version of Enterprise Edition is due to expire today.
To continue using it please visit our "Server pricing page":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/enterprise-edition.aspx" where you can check out all the pricing plans and choose the most suitable one for you or buy the Enterprise Edition Standard "right now":"$PricingPage".
If any questions related to our pricing and payment policy arise, please, contact us at "sales@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:sales@onlyoffice.com". For solving any technical problems you face do not hesitate to write to "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"

data.value:

Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.value:
Dear $UserName,
We know, business days can be crazy sometimes. If you didn't have an opportunity to take a closer look at ONLYOFFICE and would like to get a little bit more of your trial period at, we're in! Even more - if you are quick with your decision, you'll pay less!
Today you have a chance to get 20 additional days of the trial or a 20% discount on 1 or 3-year subscription to ONLYOFFICE portal. You will be able to use the discount within 5 days after receiving this message.
$GreenButton
$BlueButton
And just a quick reminder: you may as well deploy ONLYOFFICE on your private network if you are looking for enhanced security options. "Learn more":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/server-solutions.aspx"
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_payment_warning
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Please note that your ONLYOFFICE subscription is due to expire today.
In order to extend your subscription, you need to purchase a product renewal for ONLYOFFICE.
Click on the link below to start the renewal process: "Pricing page":"$PricingPage"
For your convenience, when you purchase your next renewal, you can also enable the "auto-renew" license option, in which case your license will be renewed automatically at expiration time.
A separate email with payment details for the recurrent billing will be sent on the expiration date.
You will be able to disable the "auto-renew" option at any time by accessing myAccount (My Products section) at: "https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx":"https://secure.avangate.com/myaccount/?lang=en&e=example@customer-email.com&k=xxxxxxxxxx"
For any further ONLYOFFICE installation, activation and technical support issues, please contact our support team at "http://support.onlyoffice.com/":"http://support.onlyoffice.com/"
For payment related issues please contact Avangate by email at "support@avangate.com":"mailto:support@avangate.com"
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_after30
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Even if you have no team or project to manage, ONLYOFFICE still has a lot to offer!
We'd like to invite you to ONLYOFFICE Personal, a *free workspace to manage your documents*, combining the convenience and mobility of online apps with the rich toolset of desktop solutions.
To get a quick start all you do is sign up via your Facebook or Google account. As soon as you're there you'll be able to:
# Connect your favorite cloud storage: Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive or Box. # Work with texts, spreadsheets and presentations and share them with your friends. # Co-edit and comment files, collaborate on them in real-time. # Embed documents to your web page.
$GreenButton
One more tip: all of your users can edit documents offline using "ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/desktop.aspx" or work on them on-the-go with ONYOFFICE Documents app for "iOS":"https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/onlyoffice-documents/id944896972" or "Android":"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onlyoffice.documents". It is free!
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_after_half_year
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
You haven't entered your ONLYOFFICE "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal for more than half a year. Since you have decided not to use it anymore, your web-office will be deleted. Please note that after the portal deletion all the data stored there will be fully deleted.
We would appreciate if you take the time "to tell us":"$FeedBackUrl" why you decided to stop using ONLYOFFICE. It will help us to improve our services.
If you think this is a mistake and want to continue using ONLYOFFICE, please "contact our support team":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: ItemShareDocuments

data.name: Item3rdPartyText
data.value: Let your team members use Facebook, Twitter, Google or LinkedIn to sign in. Link up your portal with Box, Dropbox, OneDrive and Google to transfer your documents. Connect DocuSign to use e-signature, Twilio - for VoIP, Bitly - to shorten links and Firebase to get notifications when you're offline.

data.name: pattern_enterprise_admin_user_powerful_tips
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Do you know that ONLYOFFICE has the most powerful online editors in the world? Having combined the best from Microsoft Office and Google Docs, we managed to achieve these goals:
# Support for all popular formats. 100% compatibility with MS Office; # Complex formatting available online; # 100% view, conversion and pagination fidelity in any browser/OS. # More collaboration capabilities: two real-time co-editing modes, review, comments, chat.
Have a look at the "comparison with different online office suites":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/document-editor-comparison.aspx" or go to your portal to check everything yourself.
$GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_opensource_admin_activation
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
You have just created your ONLYOFFICE portal, your safe and secure web office. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Follow the link below to confirm your email address:
$GreenButton
Please, complete your email activation within a week as the link is valid for 7 days only.
Note: we do not send out confidential information (like your password) in emails for safety reasons. You may change your email or password in your "Profile page":"$MyStaffLink".
To send notifications, we use the SMTP settings of our default mail server. To change them, please follow the instructions here.
For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"https://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_opensource_admin_docs_tips
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
In almost every business we are to deal with documents every day - contracts, reports, white papers, invoices, etc. - and waste a lot of time moving it around. To help you work more efficiently and reduce time and efforts spent on paperwork, make use of these 7 simple tips and tricks.
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItem6 $TableItem7 $TableItemsBtm
Do you know that you're using the most powerful online editors in the world? Want to know why ONLYOFFICE is better than MS Office Online, Google Docs or Collabora? "Look here":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/document-editor-comparison.aspx"
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"https://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_opensource_admin_security_tips
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Data security is a burning issue for most teams, especially when it comes to documents. To affirm ONLYOFFICE transparency and reliability we have opened its source code that is available on "GitHub":"https://github.com/ONLYOFFICE".
To make it even more secure:
# Turn on HTTPS to keep your portal data secure; # Backup your portal data on a regular basis to avoid any data-loss; # Track history of login attempts.
Control Panel included into ONLYOFFICE Enterprise Edition allows you to automate these processes and do even more: change the default portal logos, import users from your LDAP server, check for available ONLYOFFICE updates.
Got interested? Start free 30-day trial of the ONLYOFFICE Enterprise Edition:
$GreenButton
For more information we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"${__HelpLink}".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"https://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: subject_opensource_admin_activation
data.value: Welcome to ONLYOFFICE!

data.name: subject_opensource_admin_docs_tips
data.value: 7 Tips and Tricks to Work More Effectively in ONLYOFFICE Documents

data.name: subject_opensource_admin_security_tips
data.value: Easy Way to Make Your Portal More Secure

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips1
data.value: Tip #1. Use the Real-time Co-editing feature to speed up the interaction process when specifying details or proofreading a document. Choose between two co-editing modes - Fast when you see changes as your co-author is typing or Strict when the changes are shown only after saving the document.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips2
data.value: Tip #2. Use the Version History option to check the changes made to a file by you and your teammates or see who made the specific edits.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips3
data.value: Tip #3. Use the Review feature to avoid manual tracking changes and merging. Grant a quick access to your document for reviewing and let others suggest changes without actually editing the document. Easily accept or reject suggested changes.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips4
data.value: Tip #4. Share documents with other users or people. Attach documents as links to your email to reduce the mail traffic.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips5
data.value: Tip #5. Use the Mail Merge function to create a set of personalized messages or a templates and save time you usually spend on writing the same text several times.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips6
data.value: Tip #6. Download free ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors to work on documents without Internet connection. Note that the app can be connected to your ONLYOFFICE portal to access documents stored there.

data.name: ItemOpensourceDocsTips7
data.value: Tip #7. Download ONLYOFFICE Documents app and install it on your iOS device to work with documents anywhere, anytime, even on the go.

pattern_personal_after_registration7
data.value:
$PersonalHeaderStart Connect your favorite cloud storage to ONLYOFFICE $PersonalHeaderEnd
It has been a week since you created your cloud office, so we believe it's time to unveil some beneficial features you might have missed.
Connect *Dropbox*, *Google Drive*, *Box*, *OneDrive*, *Nextcloud*, *ownCloud* or *Yandex.Disk* to ONLYOFFICE and create a single document management space for all your documents. You'll be able to edit external files in ONLYOFFICE and save them to the storage you keep documents in. Read details about connecting file storages to ONLYOFFICE "here":"${__HelpLink}/tipstricks/add-resource.aspx".
You can also integrate ONLYOFFICE editors into Google Drive using our "connector app":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/onlyoffice-personal/iohfebkcjhlelaoibebeohcgkohkcgpn".
Need more of document management?
h3.Try ONLYOFFICE for business "in the cloud":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/cloud-office.aspx" or "on your server":"https://www.onlyoffice.com/server-solutions.aspx" for free for 30 days and check out extended document management opportunities together with a business toolset:
- Manage team documents in projects;
- Integrate documents with CRM and Email;
- Share files to groups of users;
- Optimize your workflow with team communication tools.
Interested? Learn more about "ONLYOFFICE for business":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/document-management.aspx".
Sincerely, ONLYOFFICE team

data.name: pattern_saas_admin_trial_warning_before5_coupon
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Thanks for using ONLYOFFICE. Hope, everything's OK. We just want to remind you that the trial period for your account at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" will be over in 5 days. And some good news: you can *buy a subscription with 5% off*!
Just use this coupon code while purchasing: *$Coupon*. It will be valid within the next 10 days after you receive this letter.
At this moment the number of active users in the portal is $ActiveUsers.
If you're not going to increase it considerably, we can recommend you a $$Price/$PricePeriod plan.
Please, check all the available options and choose the most suitable rate for your business.
$GreenButton
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
